post.author: 이진경
post.content:
BROADVISION - TECHNICAL LEAD and ADMINISTRATOR :.

Status:  Full Time, Employee  Salary:  CAD 75,000.00 to CAD 90,000.00 per year    

Our Client is one of the world’s Leading Service Providers – Empowering Fortune 500 businesses to MAXIMIZE! IT Infrastructure Management, Application Hosting, E- Services, and M-Commerce. A BroadVision Technical Lead is required to be the “technical go to for resolution of high level issues”. Mentor a team of BroadVision Professionals in high-level implementations, monitoring, and support of web technologies and databases. High profile client base - providing support to 25 different regions – implement new customer applications, act as the focal point of web related software, and establish new support procedures. Ideal candidates must have demonstrated expertise in a high availability support environment with an emphasis on BroadVision – current environment consists of iPlanet, LDAP, WebLogic, Websphere, UNIX, NT and Oracle. Excellent client interface skills and leadership skills a must – An exciting, challenging and invigorating environment. Tons of growth potential!

We thank you for your response, however; only those candidates being considered for an interview will be contacted. Suitable resumes will be data based for future career opportunities.  
....................................................................................................................................................................
Contact Information :.

KCI Careers Inc.
#850 36 Toronto St
Toronto M5C 2C5

post.title: BROADVISION - TECHNICAL LEAD and ADMINISTRATOR
